div.h1: Our alumni are on track to graduate from college at 5x the rate of their peers

div.div: Explore how our students are climbing the mountain to and through college and career.
Support KIPP Massachusetts and help us quadruple the graduation rate!
Join our team of educators committed to seeing our kids to and through.

div.p: KIPP Massachusetts is part of a non-profit network of college preparatory, public charter schools educating elementary, middle, and high school students. KIPP MA has an 15-year track record of preparing students in educationally under-served communities for success in college and life.

Today, we educate over 2,100 students in five public charter schools in grades K–12. KIPP MA schools are open to all students. Our public charter schools are given more academic budgetary flexibility than traditional public schools, and in exchange commit to deliver high-quality academic results for all students.

hr.p: We are part of a national network of 242 KIPP schools educating over 100,000 students and 12,000 alumni on their paths to and through college, careers, and life.
